sentence.Network_en: America cannot indefinitely serve as the breadbasket for the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国不可能无限期地作为世界的粮仓.

sentence.Network_en: More and more countries have become importers, increasing their dependence on the North American breadbasket.
sentence.Network_cn: 越来越多的国家成为粮食进口国, 加深了对北美粮食产地的依赖.

sentence.Network_en: Today, North America is not only the world's breadbasket, but its feed bag as well.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天, 北美不仅是世界的粮仓, 而且也是世界的饮料库.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 术语“粮仓（breadbasket）”（Breadbasket）通常用来指农村富饶地区。在斯拉夫文化中，会向客人献上面包和盐，以此表示对客人的欢迎。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... bread-and-butter 实用的 breadbasket 胃 breadless 无面包的.
实用酒店英语大全 – 【人人分享-人人网】 ... Teaspoon 茶勺 Breadbasket 面包篮 Sugarbowl 糖罐.

means.word_mean: 1. a geographic region serving as the principal source of grain
2. an enlarged and muscular saclike organ of the alimentary canal; the principal organ of digestion
